document_data.name: Parchment
document_data.value1e: 4 [[gp]] per sheet ([[magic scroll]]){{Cite dragon/117/Dungeoneer's Shopping Guide|24}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Parchment''' was a high-quality writing surface made from animal hide, capable of holding [[ink]], [[paint]], and other pigments.{{Cite dragon/69/Runestones|13}}
document_data.Description:
[[File:Scribe's Parchment.png|thumb|''Cheap parchment.'']]
Parchment was similar to other writing materials like [[vellum]], [[paper]], and [[papyrus]], and was relatively commonplace. It was made of animal hide, often [[goat]] or [[sheep]]skin.
document_data.Availability:
[[File:Fine Parchment.png|thumb|''Fine parchment.'']]
[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] offered high-quality parchment sheets for 1 [[gp]] each, alongside various other writing surfaces and tools.

In [[Waterdeep]], the [[League of Skinners and Tanners]] handled all aspects of tanning and [[leather]]working, including the production of parchment.

[[Calaunt]] was a great producer and exporter of leatherwork including parchment.

Usage.Spell Components:
* ''[[Rope trick]]'' used a twist of parchment.
* ''[[Shield of faith]]'' used a small piece of parchment with holy text.
* ''[[Ventriloquism]]'' used a piece of parchment rolled into a cone.
